review: Initially I LOVED this little box, but after about a week of use I began to get a pop-up saying my storage was "critically low" and I needed to delete applications. The funny thing is I haven't even started downloading any apps yet. I think the one flaw, and Amazon is already well aware of this, is the storage size. After reading other reviews and blogs and forums I guess you can't even use the USB either (for storage). Disappointing.
